law.catch_line: If a borrower violates any provision of a loan guarantee or subsidy agreement or ceases to meet the ...
law.text:
If a borrower violates any provision of a loan guarantee or subsidy agreement or ceases to meet the requirements of this subtitle, on reasonable notice to the borrower, the Board may:
withhold from the borrower further loan guarantees or subsidies until the borrower complies with the agreement or requirements; and
exercise any other remedy that the loan guarantee or subsidy agreement provides.
